thread.title: Questor share tip: Is now the time to buy Glencore?

author: John Ficenec
title: Questor share tip: Is now the time to buy Glencore?
text: Questor Questor share tip: Is now the time to buy Glencore? Investor's are abandoning FTSE 100 listed miner as commodity prices continue to fall on China weakness, says Questor Glencore, led by Ivan Glasenberg, generates most of its profits from copper By John Ficenec , Questot Editor 5:40PM BST 28 Sep 2015
